Name: Bucky Blast
Description: Everyone must use buckys

Name: You know what the Russians did in WW2?
Description: Make groups of 2 and 3 with one person as the "leader" in each group and they buy a good gun while the others rock pistols. You then follow the "leader" and pickup their gun on death

Name: Hot Potato
Description: The Person Holding the Spike can not move. The only way to move the spike is to pass it to your friends

Name: Pay it forward
Description: Everyone buys the person below them on the scoreboard a gun. Bottem frag dosen't have to buy anyone and top frag can't buy any gun for themselves

Name: Communisum
Description: The person with the most money needs to buy everyone

Name: Spacial Reload
Description: In order to reload your gun you need to pass through a teleporter

Name: Hard Read
Description: Everyone has to stack the same site

Name: Marhshel Madness
Description: Everyone must use marhsels

Name: "I don't know how to work this thing"
Description: One person is the elected "Reloader." No one else can reload their gun and must pass it to the Reloader. If the Reloader dies a new person is elected and must carry on the legacy

Name: Mr.President
Description: Bottem Frager must carry spike and must have it out at all times. The rest of the team must protect them. If they die you all must kill youselfs in shame. If the President plants they can use their pistol.

Name: Tabbed Out
Description: No one can move from the spawn postions until the end of preround

Name: Human Centipede
Description: Everyone must follow the top fragger in a straight line

Name: Rolling Thunder
Description: Everyone must buy odins or ares

Name: Over-Confident
Description: Top fragger must only use sheriff

Name: Willing Sacrifice
Description: We have angered the Valorant Gods(tenz) we must sacrifice our bottom fragger to the enemy team as repentence. Tk if they don't accept their role in the universe

Name: Trash Talk
Description: Bottem Fragger needs to type insults to enemy team in all chat. Team can decide the message (Within Reason)

Name: One-In-The-Chamber
Description: All agents must only have 1 bullet in the mag at a time

Name: Divine Revelation
Description: Bottem fragger has a vision and decides which site to go

Name: Demonic Posession
Description: Everyone must speak in impressions for the duration of the round

Name: Thrifty! (Captialism)
Description: Person with most money is only one allowed to buy. The rest must find hand-outs

Name: Door Stuck!
Description: Close all the doors

Name: COD
Description: You can't walk ONLY RUN!!!!

Name: The Ninja Way
Description: You can't stop walking for any reason. If you start running you have to immediately return to where you started running

Name: Professionals have Standards
Description: Only use Snipers. Be polite. Be efficent.

Name: Brain Rot
Description: You can't speak words. Communication is limited to grunts and motioning with your character

Name: Musicaly Inspired
Description: You can only speak in song

Name: Paranoid
Description: You must prefire all corners

Name: Cursed Speech
Description: If anyone says rotate for any reason all players must rotate around 3 times before being able to move again

Name: It can also do this
Description: All players must use a gun with an alt-fire and exlusivly use it throughout the whole round

Name: Victory Cry
Description: Whenever you get a kill you must let out a mighty roar/catchphrase

Name: Chat is this real?
Description: First to die must commentate whats happening for the rest of the round

Name: Faking
Description: Bottem fragger takes bomb and solo pushes a site while the rest of team hard pushes another

Name: Designated Defuser
Description: The only person allowed to defuse is the person who is closest to the bottom of scoreboard

Name: Freeze Kill
Description: Upon getting a kill you are stuck in place until someone comes to take your place

Name: CS:GO
Description: You can't use abilites this round

Name: Fair Game
Description: You have to annouce all of your movements and positions in all chat

Name: Clear Line
Description: Any time you want to take the zipline in mid you need to annouce it in all chat

Name: I'm Scared to go Alone
Description: The entire living team is required to go across the zipline at the same time. Everytime.

Name: Just Rush Mid
Description: Rush Mid

Name: Free Parking
Description: Nothing unique. Play Normal

Name: Pistol round
Description: Bonus Pistol Round! Only use pistols

Name: Untitled Goose
Description: Run the Untitled Goose Desktop app for the round (it's not a virus) at: https://samperson.itch.io/desktop-goose?download
